code: export var changeMode=function changeMode(mode){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"CHANGE_MODE",mode:mode});};};export var collapseSidebar=function collapseSidebar(value){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"COLLAPSE_SIDEBAR",value:value});};};export var changeNavbarColor=function changeNavbarColor(color){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"CHANGE_NAVBAR_COLOR",color:color});};};export var changeNavbarType=function changeNavbarType(style){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"CHANGE_NAVBAR_TYPE",style:style});};};export var changeFooterType=function changeFooterType(style){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"CHANGE_FOOTER_TYPE",style:style});};};export var changeMenuColor=function changeMenuColor(style){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"CHANGE_MENU_COLOR",style:style});};};export var hideScrollToTop=function hideScrollToTop(value){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:"HIDE_SCROLL_TO_TOP",value:value});};};
